EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Scheduled
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Opportunity.Account},
Greetings from Solitaire!
We wish to confirm that the agreement registration of your unit no. {!Opportunity.Project_Unit__c} is scheduled on {!Opportunity.Registration_Scheduled_Date__c} the address for the registration is {!Opportunity.Address_For_Registration__c}.
The Google Maps link for your reference:{!Opportunity.Registration_Address_Map_Link__c}
Contact Person: {!Opportunity.Contact_Person_Name_And_Number__c}
Request presence of all the applicants and do carry the Original Pan Card and 2 Passport size color photos of all the applicants.
For any concern please feel free to contact us.
Regards, Team CRM @ Solitaire
